                          // private, protected, public è®¿é—®ç±»å‹
// public å…è®¸æˆ‘åœ¨ç±»çš„å†…å¤–è¢«è°ƒç”¨
// private å…è®¸åœ¨ç±»å†…è¢«ä½¿ç”¨

  public name: string;
  public sayHi() {
    this.name;
    console.log('hi');
  }
  private sayABC() {
    this.name;
  }
}

class Teacher extends Person {
  public sayBye() {
    this.sayHi();
  }
}

class Person {
  // ä¼ ç»Ÿå†™æ³•
  // public name: string;
  // constructor(name: string) {
  //   this.name = name;
  // }

                          # é™æ€å±æ€§ï¼Œgetter, setter

                          # ä¿æŠ¤ç§æœ‰å˜é‡

                          // getter and setter
class Person {
  constructor(private _name: string) {}
  get name() {
    return this._name + ' lee';
  }
  set name(name: string) {
    const realName = name.split(' ')[0];
    this._name = realName;
  }
}

const person = new Person('dell');
console.log(person.name);
person.name = 'dell lee';
console.log(person.name);

                          _nameæ˜¯ç§æœ‰å±æ€§ï¼Œ ä¸å¯¹å¤–æš´éœ²ï¼Œ åªåœ¨å†…éƒ¨è®¿é—®ã€‚ é€šè¿‡ get, set æ¥è¿›è¡Œè®¿é—®ç§æœ‰å˜é‡ã€‚

                          # å®ç°å•ä¾‹æ¨¡å¼

                          class Demo {
  private static instance: Demo;
  private constructor(public name: string) {}

  static getInstance() {
    if (!this.instance) {
      this.instance = new Demo('dell lee');
    }
    return this.instance;
  }
}

const demo1 = Demo.getInstance();
const demo2 = Demo.getInstance();
console.log(demo1.name);
console.log(demo2.name);

                          # ç±»å‹æ–­è¨€çš„æ–¹å¼

                          åœ¨æˆ‘ä»¬å†™ä»£ç æ—¶ï¼Œ æœ‰å¯èƒ½é‡åˆ°ä»¥ä¸‹æƒ…å†µï¼š

                          æˆ‘ä»¬å®šä¹‰äº†ä¸¤ä¸ªç±»å‹æ¥å£ï¼Œ æˆ‘ä»¬å¯¹ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°è¿›è¡Œç±»å‹æ³¨è§£ï¼Œ ä½†æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨animal.sing()ä¼šå‡ºç°æŠ¥é”™ã€‚ å› ä¸º Dog æ¥å£å†…æ ¹æœ¬å°±æ²¡æœ‰sing()æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

                          å¦‚æœè¦è§£å†³è¿™ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼Œ æˆ‘ä»¬å¿…é¡»è®©å®ƒå¼ºåˆ¶ä½¿ç”¨ Brid æ¥å£æ‰å¯ä»¥ã€‚ åœ¨åŸæœ‰å‚æ•°åé¢æ·»åŠ  as å’Œ æ¥å£åæ¥å¼ºåˆ¶å®ƒä½¿ç”¨è¿™ä¸ªæ¥å£ã€‚å¹¶æ·»åŠ æ‹¬å·ã€‚

                          interface Brid {
  fly: boolean;
  sing: () => {};
}

interface Dog {
  fly: boolean;
  bark: () => {};
}

function trainAnial(animal: Brid | Dog) {
  if (animal.fly) {
    (animal as Brid).sing();
  } else {
    (animal as Dog).bark();
  }
}

                          # in è¯­æ³•åšç±»å‹ä¿æŠ¤

                          æˆ‘ä»¬è¿˜å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨inè¯­æ³•åšç±»å‹ä¿æŠ¤ã€‚

                          interface Brid {
  fly: boolean;
  sing: () => {};
}

interface Dog {
  fly: boolean;
  bark: () => {};
}

function trainAnial(animal: Brid | Dog) {
  if ('sing' in animal) {
    animal.sing();
  } else {
    animal.bark();
  }
}

                          # typeof è¯­æ³• ç±»å‹ä¿æŠ¤

                          interface Brid {
  fly: boolean;
  sing: () => {};
}

interface Dog {
  fly: boolean;
  bark: () => {};
}

function add(first: string | number, second: string | number) {
  if (typeof first === 'string' || typeof second === 'string') {
    return `${first}${second}`;
  }
  return first + second;
}

                          # ä½¿ç”¨ instanceof ç±»å‹ä¿æŠ¤

                          è¿™é‡Œæ³¨æ„è¦ä½¿ç”¨ç±»classï¼Œ è€Œä¸æ˜¯æ¥å£interface

                          class numberObj {
  count: number;
}

function addSecond(first: object | numberObj, second: object | numberObj) {
  if (first instanceof numberObj && second instanceof numberObj) {
    return first.count + second.count;
  }
  return 0;
}

                          interface Item {
  name: string;
}
class DataManager<T extends Item> {
  constructor(private data: T[]) {}
  getItem(index: number): string {
    return this.data[index].name;
  }
}

const data = new DataManager([
  {
    name: 'dell'
  }
]);

                          # å‘½åç©ºé—´

                          åœ¨æˆ‘ä»¬å†™ä»£ç æ—¶ï¼Œ å¯èƒ½æœ‰å¾ˆå¤šå˜é‡ä¼šå˜æˆå…¨å±€å˜é‡ï¼Œ æ±¡æŸ“å…¨å±€ç¯å¢ƒï¼Œ åœ¨è¿™ç§æƒ…å†µä¸‹æˆ‘ä»¬å°±å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å‘½åç©ºé—´äº†ï¼Œ å…·ä½“ä½¿ç”¨å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                          namespace Home {
  class Header {
    constructor() {
      const elem = document.createElement('div');
      elem.innerText = 'This is Header';
      document.body.appendChild(elem);
    }
  }

  class Content {
    constructor() {
      const elem = document.createElement('div');
      elem.innerText = 'This is Content';
      document.body.appendChild(elem);
    }
  }

  class Footer {
    constructor() {
      const elem = document.createElement('div');
      elem.innerText = 'This is Footer';
      document.body.appendChild(elem);
    }
  }

  export class Page {
    constructor() {
      new Header();
      new Content();
      new Footer();
    }
  }
}

                          æŠŠæ‰€æœ‰çš„ç±»éƒ½æ”¾åœ¨HOMEå‘½åç©ºé—´ä¸‹ï¼Œ åªæŠŠPage æš´éœ²å‡ºå»ã€‚

                          components.ts

                          namespace Components {
  export interface user {
    name: string;
  }

  export class Header {
    constructor() {
      const elem = document.createElement('div');
      elem.innerText = 'This is Header';
      document.body.appendChild(elem);
    }
  }

  export class Content {
    constructor() {
      const elem = document.createElement('div');
      elem.innerText = 'This is Content';
      document.body.appendChild(elem);
    }
  }

  export class Footer {
    constructor() {
      const elem = document.createElement('div');
      elem.innerText = 'This is Footer';
      document.body.appendChild(elem);
    }
  }
}

                          page.ts

                          ///<reference path="components.ts" />

namespace Home {
  export namespace Dell {
    export const teacher: Components.user = {
      name: 'dell'
    };
  }
  export class Page {
    constructor() {
      new Components.Header();
      new Components.Content();
      new Components.Footer();
      new Components.Footer();
    }
  }
}

                          components.ts

                          export class Header {
  constructor() {
    const elem = document.createElement('div');
    elem.innerText = 'This is Header';
    document.body.appendChild(elem);
  }
}

export class Content {
  constructor() {
    const elem = document.createElement('div');
    elem.innerText = 'This is Content';
    document.body.appendChild(elem);
  }
}

  constructor() {
    const elem = document.createElement('div');
    elem.innerText = 'This is Footer';
    document.body.appendChild(elem);
  }
}

                          page.ts

                          import { Header, Content, Footer } from './components';

export default class Page {
  constructor() {
    new Header();
    new Content();
    new Footer();
  }
}

                          index.html

                          <!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <title>Document</title>
    <script src="https://cdn.bootcss.com/require.js/2.3.6/require.js"></script>
    <script src="./dist/page.js"></script>
  </head>

  <body>
    <script>
      require(['page'], function(page) {
        new page.default();
      });
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

                          // Es6 æ¨¡å—åŒ–
declare module 'jquery' {
  interface JqueryInstance {
    html: (html: string) => JqueryInstance;
  }
  // æ··åˆç±»å‹
  function $(readyFunc: () => void): void;
  function $(selector: string): JqueryInstance;
  namespace $ {
    namespace fn {
      class init {}
    }
  }
  export = $;
}

                          # æ³›å‹ä¸­ keyof è¯­æ³•çš„ä½¿ç”¨

                          å¦‚æœä½ æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªç±»é‡Œé¢æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œ ç„¶åä½ æƒ³æ ¹æ® indexï¼Œæˆ–è€… key å€¼è·å–å¯¹è±¡é‡Œçš„æŸä¸€ä¸ªå†…å®¹çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œ åˆæƒ³æ¨æ–­å‡ºäº‰å–çš„è¿”å›å†…å®¹ç±»å‹çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œ é‚£ä¹ˆä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ keyofã€‚å…·ä½“ä½¿ç”¨å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                          interface Person {
  name: string;
  age: number;
  gender: string;
}

// type NAME = 'name';
// key: 'name';
// Person['name'];

// type T = 'age'
// key: 'age'
// Person['age']

// type T = 'gender'
// key: 'gender'
// Person['gender']

class Teacher {
  constructor(private info: Person) {}
  getInfo<T extends keyof Person>(key: T): Person[T] {
    return this.info[key];
  }
}

const teacher = new Teacher({
  name: 'dell',
  age: 18,
  gender: 'male'
});

const test = teacher.getInfo('name'); //stringç±»å‹
const test1 = teacher.getInfo('age'); //numberç±»å‹
const test2 = teacher.getInfo('gender'); //stringç±»å‹
// const test3 = teacher.getInfo('hello');//æŠ¥é”™
console.log(test);

                          # è£…é¥°å™¨

                          # ç±»è£…é¥°å™¨

                          è£…é¥°å™¨æœ¬èº«æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ï¼Œ å®ƒé€šè¿‡@ç¬¦å·æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

                          å¦‚æœæƒ³è¦ä½¿ç”¨è£…é¥°å™¨ï¼Œ é¦–å…ˆè¦å¼€å¯ä»¥ä¸‹è®¾ç½®ï¼š

                          è£…é¥°å™¨åªåœ¨ç±»å®šä¹‰çš„æ—¶å€™èµ·ä½œç”¨ ï¼Œ å¹¶ä¸æ˜¯å®ä¾‹åŒ–çš„æ—¶å€™ã€‚

                          // ç±»çš„è£…é¥°å™¨
// ç±»è£…é¥°å™¨æ¥å—çš„å‚æ•°æ˜¯æ„é€ å‡½æ•°
function testDecorator(flag: boolean) {
  if (flag) {
    return function(constructor: any) {
      constructor.prototype.getName = () => {
        console.log('dell');
      };
    };
  } else {
    return function(constructor: any) {};
  }
}

@testDecorator(true)
class Test {}

const test = new Test();
(test as any).getName();

                          æˆ‘ä»¬æ¥ä¸‹æ¥çœ‹ä¸€ç§æ›´æ ‡å‡†çš„è£…é¥°å™¨å†™æ³•ï¼š

                          index.ts

                          function testDecorator() {
  return function<T extends new (...args: any[]) => any>(constructor: T) {
    return class extends constructor {
      name = 'lee';
      getName() {
        return this.name;
      }
    };
  };
}

const Test = testDecorator()(
  class {
    name: string;
    constructor(name: string) {
      this.name = name;
    }
  }
);

const test = new Test('dell');
console.log(test.getName());

                          # æ–¹æ³•è£…é¥°å™¨

                          index.ts

                          // æ™®é€šæ–¹æ³•ï¼Œtarget å¯¹åº”çš„æ˜¯ç±»çš„ prototype
// é™æ€æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œtarget å¯¹åº”çš„æ˜¯ç±»çš„æ„é€ å‡½æ•°

function getNameDecorator(
  target: any,
  key: string,
  descriptor: PropertyDescriptor
) {
  // console.log(target, key);
  // descriptor.writable = true;
  descriptor.value = function() {
    return 'decorator';
  };
}

class Test {
  name: string;
  constructor(name: string) {
    this.name = name;
  }
  @getNameDecorator
  getName() {
    return this.name;
  }
}

const test = new Test('dell');
console.log(test.getName());

                          # è®¿é—®å™¨çš„è£…é¥°å™¨

                          function visitDecorator(
  target: any,
  key: string,
  descriptor: PropertyDescriptor
) {
  // descriptor.writable = false;
}

class Test {
  private _name: string;
  constructor(name: string) {
    this._name = name;
  }
  get name() {
    return this._name;
  }
  @visitDecorator
  set name(name: string) {
    this._name = name;
  }
}

const test = new Test('dell');
test.name = 'dell lee';
console.log(test.name);

                          // function nameDecorator(target: any, key: string): any {
//   const descriptor: PropertyDescriptor = {
//     writable: false
//   };
//   return descriptor;
// }

// test.name = 'dell lee';

// ä¿®æ”¹çš„å¹¶ä¸æ˜¯å®ä¾‹ä¸Šçš„ nameï¼Œ è€Œæ˜¯åŸå‹ä¸Šçš„ name
function nameDecorator(target: any, key: string): any {
  target[key] = 'lee';
}

// name æ”¾åœ¨å®ä¾‹ä¸Š
class Test {
  @nameDecorator
  name = 'Dell';
}

const test = new Test();
console.log((test as any).__proto__.name);

                          # å‚æ•°è£…é¥°å™¨

                          // åŸå‹ï¼Œæ–¹æ³•åï¼Œå‚æ•°æ‰€åœ¨çš„ä½ç½®
function paramDecorator(target: any, method: string, paramIndex: number) {
  console.log(target, method, paramIndex);
}

class Test {
  getInfo(name: string, @paramDecorator age: number) {
    console.log(name, age);
  }
}

const test = new Test();
test.getInfo('Dell', 30);

                          # ä½¿ç”¨æ¡ˆä¾‹

                          const userInfo: any = undefined;

function catchError(msg: string) {
  return function(target: any, key: string, descriptor: PropertyDescriptor) {
    const fn = descriptor.value;
    descriptor.value = function() {
      try {
        fn();
      } catch (e) {
        console.log(msg);
      }
    };
  };
}

class Test {
  @catchError('userInfo.name ä¸å­˜åœ¨')
  getName() {
    return userInfo.name;
  }
  @catchError('userInfo.age ä¸å­˜åœ¨')
  getAge() {
    return userInfo.age;
  }
  @catchError('userInfo.gender ä¸å­˜åœ¨')
  getGender() {
    return userInfo.gender;
  }
}

const test = new Test();
test.getName();
test.getAge();
